member.name: F:Sparrow.BulletGraph.DockPanel._ignorePropertyChange
member.summary: A value indicating whether a dependency property change handler should ignore the next change notification. This is used to reset the value of properties without performing any of the actions in their change handlers.

member.summary: Gets the value of the attached property for the specified element.
member.param: The element from which the property value is read.
member.returns: The property value for the element.

member.name: M:Sparrow.BulletGraph.DockPanel.SetDock(System.Windows.UIElement,Sparrow.BulletGraph.Dock)
member.summary: Sets the value of the attached property for the specified element to the specified dock value.
member.param: The element to which the attached property is assigned.
The dock value to assign to the specified element.

member.name: P:Sparrow.BulletGraph.DockPanel.LastChildFill
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the last child element added to a resizes to fill the remaining space.
member.value: True if the last element added resizes to fill the remaining space, false to indicate the last element does not resize. The default is true.
